content: to * 7 times join with slip_stitch in top of beg ch3 slip_stitch in next ch2 space 8 popcorn sts 8 ch2 sps round 3 ch3 1 double_crochet ch2 2 double_crochet in same space as slip_stitch shell in next ch2 space 7 times join with slip_stitch in top of beg ch3 slip_stitch in next double_crochet 8 shells round 4 ch3 *shell in next ch2 space double_crochet in next double_crochet skip next 2 double_crochet double_crochet in next double_crochet* repeat from * to * 7 times shell in next ch2 space double_crochet in next double_crochet join with sl st in top of beg ch3 slip_stitch in next double_crochet 8 shells 16 double_crochet round 5 ch3 double_crochet in next double_crochet *shell in next ch2 space double_crochet in next 2 double_crochet skip next 2 double_crochet double_crochet in next 2 double_crochet* repeat from * to * 7 times shell in next ch2 space double_crochet in next 2 double_crochet join with slip_stitch in top of beg ch3 slip_stitch in next double_crochet 8 shells 32 double_crochet round 6 ch3 double_crochet in next 2 double_crochet * shell in next ch2 space double_crochet in next 3 double_crochet skip next 2 double_crochet double_crochet in next 3 double_crochet* repeat from * to * 7 times shell in next ch2 space double_crochet in next 3 double_crochet join with slip_stitch in top of beg ch3 slip_stitch in next double_crochet 8 shells 48 double_crochet round 7 ch3 double_crochet in next 3 double_crochet *shell in next ch2 space double_crochet in next 4 double_crochet skip next 2 double_crochet double_crochet in next 4 double_crochet* repeat from * to * 7 times shell in next ch2 space double_crochet in next 4 double_crochet join with slip_stitch in top of beg ch3 slip_stitch in next double_crochet 8 shells 64 double_crochet round 8 ch1 single_crochet in same st as slip_stitch and in next 4 double_crochet *3 single_crochet in next ch2 single_crochet single_crochet in next 5 double_crochet decrease over next 2 double_crochet single_crochet in next 5 double_crochet* repeat from * to * 7 times single_crochet in next ch2 space 3 times single_crochet in next 5 double_crochet decrease over next 2 sts in the next double_crochet and in the next slip_stitch join with slip_stitch in top of first single_crochet 8 decrease 104 single_crochet *page 4* round 9 ch1 single_crochet in same st as slip_stitch and in next 6 5 single_crochet *3 single_crochet in next single_crochet single_crochet in next 7 6 single_crochet slip_stitch in next single_crochet single_crochet in next 7 6 single_crochet* repeat from * to * 7 times 3 single_crochet in next single_crochet single_crochet in next 7 6 single_crochet slip_stitch in next single_crochet join with slip_stitch in top of first single_crochet 8 sl sts - not including very last slip_stitch at end of round 120 single_crochet fasten_off and weave in ends securely with tapestry needle *page 5* pineapple dreams dish cloth by julee a reeves finished size 10 x 10 materials main color- approx 2 ozs worsted weight cotton yarn contrasting color- 1 ball of cotton yarn will make many borders on many
